text: they came into Mara and they could not drink the waters of Mara because they were bitter, whereupon he gave a name also agreeable to the place, calling it Mara, that is, Bitterness.

segments.text: they came into Mara and they could not drink the waters of Mara because they were bitter,
whereupon he gave a name also agreeable to the place, calling it Mara, that is, Bitterness.
